dialogue.text: Damn, that chick is crazy. She's got good sound though, I'll give her that.
Heh... I can always tell when she's up to one of her schemes.
Huh-? You know her?
I've known her for almost a year now. We happen to be a duo group ourselves. 'The Flame of Togarashi Town' is what the locals have called us.
She's the roaring fire, and I'm the accenting ashen cloud right behind it.
Smoky... is my name.
Dang, I don't think I heard of y'all before, and I've been coming to this place every week at least once my whole life.
We haven't put ourselves out there yet. Spicy definitely knows you two though.
She's been obsessed after she saw what you guys did at the end of your show together. Not every musician is capable of awakening their inner RAVE like that.
...inner RAVE?
Hmm? You sound confused. Has nobody informed you on the RAVE that you and Sweet had awakened all those months ago?
Yeah. sorry dude. I'm real lost.
Then... allow me to explain.
RAVE, from what we understand so far, is... a physical manifestation of passion. Every living thing with a creative conscience has a bit of RAVE inside it.
If you're passionate enough about something in the moment, that passion can be tapped into and manifest into special powers and abilities unique to the individual.
That's the simplest way I can explain it. What you and Sweet did at your show together; That power you awakened... That was the power of RAVE.
RAVE, huh?
...honestly, I'd be freaking out a LOT more over having some crazy anime transformation power if I still wasn't so confused.
So this has just been a thing people can do this whole time? Why aren't people going all super-mode left and right, then? Specially since it seems pretty easy to do.
What you two did goes beyond what most can do with RAVE. It's very rare, but certain people can take their inner RAVE and manifest it into a whole new physical form.
Even less is known about that special type of RAVE power, but it's always a spectacle when it occurs.
Spicy desperately wants to awaken a form like that, but she's been very unsuccessful so far.
Heh, guess she's hoping some of our power will rub off on her by challenging us. I can't lie, I'm feelin' real special after learning about all this RAVE stuff.
Though what about you? You got your own crazy RAVE power or something?
Care to find out while they continue their bout?
Hell yeah, I'm down. Whatcha got, Smoky?
